API reference
*************


Atom
====

class atom.Atom(num=0, x=0.0, y=0.0, z=0.0, typ='ND')

   A simple class to store the coordinate (x,y,z) and other atom
   properties

   cord

   num

   show

   typ


Molecule
========

class molecule.Molecule(num=0, atms=None)

   addatm(atm)

   atomlist

   noatm

   num

   show
